about_the_game:
Step into the serene charm of Timber Trails Alpine Puzzle, a jigsaw adventure that transports you to the heart of the Alps. Immerse yourself in the tranquility of rustic alpine cabins, towering pine forests, and snow-dusted mountain peaks, all brought to life with stunning puzzle scenes that capture the magic of the mountains.

From cozy cabin interiors filled with intricate details to sweeping vistas of alpine trails, each puzzle piece draws you deeper into a world of breathtaking scenery and hidden mountain secrets. Choose from relaxing 30-piece puzzles or challenge yourself with larger 285-piece layouts, perfect for puzzle lovers of all skill levels.

With each completed puzzle, unlock a new alpine landscape or secluded cabin tucked away in the wilderness. Each scene brings a fresh exploration of mountain life, inviting players to discover hidden objects, unlock surprises, and uncover scenic routes that map the entire alpine range.

Featuring high-quality artwork that captures the natural beauty of the Alps, Timber Trails: Alpine Puzzle offers a soothing yet immersive journey that celebrates mountain life. Whether you're an avid puzzler or a nature enthusiast, this game combines beautiful imagery, layered landscapes, and satisfying gameplay for hours of exploration. Join this alpine escape and piece together the wonder of the mountains, one puzzle at a time.

name: Timber Trails Alpine Puzzle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB or higher
  • Storage: 375 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Timber Trails: Alpine Puzzle invites you to the scenic Alps, where each jigsaw reveals cozy cabins, snowy peaks, and lush pine forests. Solve puzzles ranging from 30 to 285 pieces, unlocking new alpine landscapes and hidden mountain trails in a relaxing yet immersive escape to nature’s beauty.
